member.name: IWebWizardExtension.SetErrorURL
member.summary: Specifies the URL of a page that displays when a user experiences an error while navigating through the wizard extension pages.
member.param: The URL of the page to display.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWebWizardExtension.SetInitialURL
member.summary: Sets the URL of the initial server-provided HTML page in a hosted wizard.
member.param: The URL of the initial server-provided HTML page.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWebWizardExtension
member.summary: Extends the interface by exposing methods to set the wizard extension's initial URL, and a specific URL in case of an error.
